name: Victoria (Avineesh "Avi" Kompella)
description:
A game for the 2019 Global Game Jam. A kidnapped princess from a distant kingdom breaks free of her prison and runs off, away from the bandits that abducted her. From there, she encounters people and situations that not only provide her with friendship, but also bring her closer to home. Press ESC to quit the game. For the second minigame - where you must fight off bandits - By default, you're in the shielded position; guard against the arrows, but NOT the bandits. Press the Q key to attack with your sword. Be careful - attack bandits and NOT the arrows. Use the arrow keys to change the direction you're facing. Obtain at least 100 points before the timer runs out to win!

Credits: 

Artists: Arielle Jasmine Michelle Irada, Stephanie Pocci

Programmers: Michael Kirk, Avineesh Kompella, and Michael Perez

Lead Designer: Avineesh Kompella

Writer: Stephanie Pocci

Sound Engineer: Nicholas Rogers

For more information, check out our Global Game Jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/victoria
